type.name: effectivity_organisation_or_person_in_organisation_item
type.description: This select extends the assignments of an organization or a person in an organization to Effectivity instances.

entity.name: Effectivity
entity.description: An Effectivity is the domain of applicability of product data.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: the identification of the Effectivity assigned by the organisation.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: words by which the Effectivity is known.

inverse.name: identifier
inverse.description: the organisation (or person in an organisation) that assigned and owns the Effectivity id.

entity.name: Effectivity_relationship
entity.description: An Effectivity_relationship specifies that two effectivities are related. This is a foundation concept which may be refined in other modules. This concept can be used to define sequencing.

explicit.name: relation_type
explicit.description: an optional type descriptor for the relationship.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: an optional description of the relationship.

explicit.name: effectivity1
explicit.description: the Effectivity to be related to effectivity2.

explicit.name: effectivity2
explicit.description: the Effectivity to be related to effectivity1.

entity.name: Serial_effectivity
entity.description: A Serial_effectivity is applicability of product data based on one or more serialized instances of an end item.

explicit.name: end
explicit.description: the last valid serial number. If a value for this attribute is not defined, the interval of applicability has no upper bound.

entity.name: Dated_effectivity
entity.description: A Dated_effectivity is applicability of product data based on a date or date range.

explicit.name: end_date
explicit.description: the last valid date. If a value for this attribute is not defined, the interval of applicability has no upper bound.

entity.name: Time_interval_effectivity
entity.description: A Time_interval_effectivity is applicability of product data based on a span of time.

explicit.name: interval
explicit.description: the span of time for which the applicability is valid.

entity.name: Lot_effectivity
entity.description: A Lot_effectivity is applicability of product data based on a lot of a certain size.

explicit.name: lot_id
explicit.description: the identification of the batch of items.

explicit.name: lot_size
explicit.description: the size of the batch of items.
